title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy to try to bring their mother back to life, leading them on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where nearly every human has a superpower, a powerless boy strives to become a hero.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A young boy fights demons to avenge his family and cure his sister, who has been turned into a demon.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew seek the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: The adventures of Goku and his friends as they defend the Earth from powerful enemies.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

title: One Punch Man
description: A hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch struggles with boredom and finding a real challenge.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game, with death in the game meaning death in real life.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter, and struggles with his new identity.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A young pilot is recruited to defend humanity from mysterious beings called Angels using giant bio-mechanical robots.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy embarks on a quest to find his missing father and become a Hunter.

title: Bleach
description: A teenager acquires the powers of a Soul Reaper to protect the world from evil spirits.

title: Fairy Tail
description: The adventures of Natsu Dragneel and his friends in the magical guild, Fairy Tail.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: A group of bounty hunters travel the galaxy in search of dangerous criminals.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends discover time travel, but their actions create unintended consequences.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers swap bodies and try to meet each other in person while uncovering a mystery.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl is trapped in a mysterious, magical world and must find a way to escape.

title: Fruits Basket
description: A girl is taken in by a family cursed to turn into animals of the Chinese Zodiac.

title: Black Clover
description: A boy born without magic in a world where magic is everything, aspires to become the Wizard King.

title: Re:Zero
description: A young man is transported to another world where he discovers that he can reset time after his death.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: A young woman, formerly a soldier, seeks to learn about emotions and human connections after the war.

title: The Promised Neverland
description: A group of children uncover dark secrets about their orphanage and plan to escape.

title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
description: A man is transported to another world where he becomes the Shield Hero and must protect the kingdom.

title: Clannad
description: A high school student with a troubled past discovers friendship, love, and family in his journey through life.

title: Erased
description: A man is sent back in time to prevent a series of murders, starting with the death of his childhood friend.

title: Toradora!
description: A romantic comedy about two high school students who help each other pursue their respective crushes.

title: Noragami
description: A minor deity seeking fame and recognition takes on odd jobs to build his reputation.

title: Code Geass
description: A young man gains the power of absolute obedience and uses it to lead a rebellion against a tyrannical empire.

title: Akame ga Kill!
description: A young swordsman joins a group of assassins fighting a corrupt empire.

title: Gurren Lagann
description: A boy and his friends fight to free humanity from subterranean oppression using a giant robot.

title: Soul Eater
description: Students at a school for weapon meisters fight to collect souls and protect the world from evil.

title: Blue Exorcist
description: The son of Satan trains to become an exorcist to fight against his own kind.

title: KonoSuba
description: A teenager is transported to a fantasy world and forms a dysfunctional party to defeat the Demon King.

title: Angel Beats!
description: A group of students in the afterlife band together to fight against an enigmatic girl and their fate.

title: Elfen Lied
description: A girl with deadly telekinetic powers escapes captivity, leaving a trail of destruction.

title: Made in Abyss
description: A young girl and her robot companion venture into a mysterious abyss to find her missing mother.

title: Dr. Stone
description: A genius scientist aims to rebuild civilization after humanity is mysteriously petrified for thousands of years.

title: Ao Haru Ride
description: A girl reunites with her first love in high school, but their relationship is complicated by the past.

title: The Ancient Magus' Bride
description: A girl with extraordinary abilities is sold to a sorcerer, who takes her as his apprentice and bride.

title: Parasyte: The Maxim
description: A teenager battles against parasitic creatures that take over human bodies.

title: Hellsing
description: The Hellsing Organization fights vampires and supernatural threats to protect humanity.

title: No Game No Life
description: Two genius siblings are transported to a world where games decide everything.

title: Fate/Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works
description: Mages and their summoned heroes fight in a battle royale for the Holy Grail.

title: Yuri on Ice
description: A figure skater gets a second chance in his career with the help of a renowned coach.

title: Kimi ni Todoke
description: A shy girl struggles to make friends and find love due to her resemblance to a horror movie character.

title: Vinland Saga
description: A young Viking seeks revenge for his father's death and becomes embroiled in a larger conflict.

title: Berserk
description: A mercenary with a tragic past fights to survive in a dark, medieval world.

title: Trinity Seven
description: A boy enrolls in a magical school to save his cousin and learn the secrets of magic.
